abstract: In a deal that will greatly expand its cabinet of household items, B&G Foods will pay $325 million to buy Mrs. Dash seasoning and five other lesser-known brands from Unilever.
snippet: In a deal that will greatly expand its cabinet of household items, B&G Foods will pay $325 million to buy Mrs. Dash seasoning and five other lesser-known brands from Unilever.

headline.main: Mrs. Dash Finds a Home at B&G Foods
